subject: Stereo Vision 3D Movies Next Boom
body:
Wall Street Reporting  BREAKING NEWS   
		/ Entertainment
  









 







Breaking News....... Baywatch Creator Elected Chairman at Stero Vision Entertainment OTC:BB: SVSN










NASDAQ

				  |  


NYSE

				  |  


AMEX

				  |  


OTC:BB
















STEREO VISION ENTERTAINMENT INC 


 
  




















Baywatch Creator Spie Schwartz Becomes 
								Chairman at Stereo Vision


								6/18/2007

  


  









LOS ANGELES, Jun 18, 2007 
								(BUSINESS 
								WIRE) -- 
STEREO VISION 
								ENTERTAINMENT, INC. (OTCBB:SVSN) announced 
								today that Spie Schwartz, Creator and 
								Executive Producer of "Baywatch", along with 
								dozens of other movies and TV shows, has been 
								appointed Chairman of the Board with immediate 
								effect. 
Stereo Vision's 
								Chief Executive Officer, Jack Honour, stated,
								"For over three years now, Spie's been 
								helping to steer the Stereo Vision crew through 
								the turbulent waters of the entertainment world. 
								We're very proud to have earned the opportunity 
								to be working with such a consummate 
								professional. Spie's iconic family has had 
								him in the midst of the entertainment 

								industry since 
								childhood. With his father head-writing and 
								developing shows with such legends as Bob 
								Hope, and Lucille Ball, and his uncle 
								Sherwood creating among others, 'Gilligan's 
								Island' and 'The Brady Bunch,' at 
								home growing up, Spie was surrounded by people 
								like Red Skelton and Jackie Gleason. 
								True to his family's heritage, Spie produced his 
								first piece when he was fourteen, it was shown 
								on network television, and he was featured on 
								the Johnny Carson show -- the youngest person 
								ever to do so. It's very gratifying to me, the 
								Board and all the founding partners, to have 
								created a formula that Spie so fully believes 
								in." 
Chairman Schwartz 
								added, "I have the highest confidence in the 
								public's interest in going out to theatres to 
								see polarized 3-D movies. Just check out the 
								numbers. Stereo Vision's timing couldn't be 
								better. I'm looking forward to guiding the 
								Stereo Vision team as we work towards becoming a 
								leading 

								provider of polarized 
								3-D content." 

About Stereo 
								Vision: 
Located in Van Nuys, 
								California, Stereo Vision Entertainment
								
								www.stereovision.com  is a publicly 
								traded, vertically integrated media 

								company, with 
								interests in film, television, and music 
								production properties. Stereo Vision's business 
								is driven by the production and acquisition of 
								cutting-edge entertainment media assets.
